Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Messen und Beurteilen von Luftschadstoffen - Air Quality Project 2024

Messages.Author: Letizia Abis
Messages.Content: For the final presentation, you will have to prepare 3-4 slides max where you shortly summarize the results of the research and the main take home message of it, the purpose here is not to explain everything but to discuss the project with your colleagues as if we were in a real conference so that you will present for 2 min and you will get 7-8 min questions that the audience will prepare,  during this final conference, I will evaluate the short presentation, how you answered the questions and your participation in the conference (plan to ask some questions to the other groups, this will be evaluated as well)  this is how I plan to evaluate the final conference:

Messages.Author: Letizia Abis
Messages.Content: Dear students,  please find the details about the final video that you have to prepare and where to upload it (TUB cloud), on the ISIS page of our course,  the deadline for the video is on the 15 of July, it doesn't really matter the time, before midnight is good, they will be available for all of us on Tuesday morning on ISIS. best,  Letizia

Messages.Author: Letizia Abis
Messages.Content: Dear students,  I read all the draft projects that you sent me,  for the one that uploaded it on ISIS you will find the comments, no evaluation is planned for the draft of the project, I will evaluate the final work.  Let me know if you need some more suggestions or help for the final project!  for now, well done:) Best,  Letizia

Messages.Author: Letizia Abis
Messages.Content: Dear students,  today we will perform a short exercise in class with R studio,  we will install it together and play with it a bit,  it's important that you bring your own computer,  looking forward to meeting you later, best  Letizia
